changeSet.author: mdaly
changeSet.comment: Remove triplication from the list of reported variants.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE `prodlims`.`horizondisease` SET `variationsAndExons` = 'c.427T>C, gene deletions' WHERE `name` = 'Alpha-Thalassemia' AND `provider` = 'MTSINAI'; UPDATE `prodlims`.`horizondisease` SET `variationsAndExons` = 'Deletions and pathogenic point mutations' WHERE `name` = 'Alpha-Thalassemia' AND `provider` = 'BMGL';
changeSet.rollback: UPDATE `prodlims`.`horizondisease` SET `variationsAndExons` = 'c.427T>C, gene deletions, triplications' WHERE `name` = 'Alpha-Thalassemia' AND `provider` = 'MTSINAI'; UPDATE `prodlims`.`horizondisease` SET `variationsAndExons` = 'Deletions, Triplications and point mutations' WHERE `name` = 'Alpha-Thalassemia' AND `provider` = 'BMGL';
